identified-content.object.title: Zack Files, The (TV Program)
identified-content.classifier: Top/Classifieds/Job Market/Job Categories/Media, Entertainment and Publishing

abstract.p: Photo of actor Robert Clark in The Zack Files, new series on Fox Family Channel

block.p: Robert Clark (center, with Julian Richings as the mad hatter and Cliff Saunders as the white rabbit) plays a teenager determined to document the strangeness that surrounds him in ''The Zack Files,'' a new series that begins on Saturday at 1:30 p.m. on Fox Family. (Fox Family)

Robert Clark (center, with Julian Richings as the mad hatter and Cliff Saunders as the white rabbit) plays a teenager determined to document the strangeness that surrounds him in ''The Zack Files,'' a new series that begins on Saturday at 1:30 p.m. on Fox Family. (Fox Family)
